scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/scripts && cp scripts/postinstall.js dist/scripts/ && for f in $(find scripts -type f ! -name '*.ts' ! -name 'postinstall.js'); do mkdir -p dist/$(dirname $f) && cp $f dist/$f; done
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run copy-assets
scripts.pack: npm run prepare && npm publish --access public
